servinfo.title: Electric Throttle Body Assembly Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Intake Collector and Intake Manifold Components
Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection

s1.ptxt: Release fuel pressure in fuel feed line by referring to Fuel Pressure Relief Procedure .
Drain engine coolant referring to Cooling System Draining .
Remove intake air pipe (1), surge tank pipe (2) and IMT valve (3).
Disconnect connectors from electric throttle body assembly (1) and fuel injectors (2) of LH (No.1) bank.
Disconnect fuel connect pipe (1) from delivery pipe.
Disconnect water hose (2) from electric throttle body assembly.
Remove LH (No.1) bank delivery pipe (1) with fuel pressure regulator (2).
Detach electric throttle body assembly (1) from intake collector.
Disconnect water hose (2) from electric throttle body assembly.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following.

item.ptxt: Clean mating surfaces and use new throttle body gasket (1).
Use new fuel connector pipe gaskets.
Tighten fuel connector pipe union bolts and delivery pipe bolts to specified torque referring to Fuel System Components .
Use new surge tank pipe gaskets.
Check to ensure that all removed parts are back in place.
Reinstall any necessary parts which have not been reinstalled.
Refill cooling system referring to Cooling System Flush and Refill .
Upon completion of installation, verify that there is no fuel leakage at each connection according to Fuel Leakage Check Procedure .
